A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: You just cannot throw twists to cover the absence  of a well written and thought plot. Its the first time ever I see a hero/protagonist going to a dark place to learn about themselves and come out of the \"cave\" without any lesson or message other than a matrix kind of flashy-empty scene. The evil guys are just not credible as an entity and nothing in the movie helps them being more scary. Appalled at the incredible potential of a roster of very beloved carachters ( old and new) and very talented actors being wasted. Critics reviews are just hilarious. In all honesty\, expect something more similar to transformers for quality and replayability. Unfortunately not the Last
